channel.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?
channel.description: After almost 2 years of waiting for the damn thing I find the game and the main character from the game (Watch Dogs)Aiden Pearce just plain awful,so is there any chance I can change my profile name?

item.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?
item.dc:creator: Diabolical
item.description:
Aiden Pearce:

Thanks.

You’re welcome.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?

item.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
varg.666:

You can just look it up here under “View Forum Leaders”.

Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?

item.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?
item.dc:creator: Diabolical
item.description:
Aiden Pearce:

Ok,I would appreciate if you can give me the name of one of the admins so I can PM him.

You can just look it up here under “View Forum Leaders”.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?

item.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
Flatline:

You’ll have to PM an admin, mods don’t have the ability to change names. Trust me, I’ve tried.

Ok,I would appreciate if you can give me the name of one of the admins so I can PM him.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?

item.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?

item.description:
You’ll have to PM an admin, mods don’t have the ability to change names. Trust me, I’ve tried.

item.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
danielsangeo:

We altered your name, Maxey.

Pray we don’t alter it any further.

Can you PLEASE change mine to Archangel(aka Garrus Vakarian)?I would REALLY be grateful.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Yeah, just ask a mod to change it.

When I first joined my username was Lord P. Serpents but apparently that was offensive to certain minorities and it got changed to this fucking bullshit gay name.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?

item.title: Is it possible to change profile name on this forum?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
None whatsoever.

Unless you ask a moderator, that is. I’m sure they’ll be willing to let you change up.

Read full topic
